If the Canaanites were the last of the Nephilim, how did they survive the flood? One thought may be that the genetic information was carried in on or more of the wives of the sons of Noah. It is said that the generations of Noah were pure, not that the generations of his wife or daughter-in-laws. It is possible that the genetic information was passed down from the Nephilim to their children, including any daughters they had. The Bible does leave this open for some debate. Since the followers of Satan are fallen Angels, they would be able to live in the spiritual realm, separate from Earth and safe from the Flood. If so and they could have children with mortal women, they could simply repeat their pre-flood rebellion. I have not read the old testament apocrypha but I understand there may be an explanation there. Jesus does say that as it was in the days of Noah so it shall be in the last days. Let me see, man is doing what is right in their own eyes, calling good evil and evil good. We have many people seeking power, for the sake of power. We teach that there is no God. So, it seems that we cannot be far from the days of Noah. That should give one cause for thought.
